00013 bool DH2::Agree(byte *agreedValue,
00014                 const byte *staticSecretKey, const byte *ephemeralSecretKey, 
00015                 const byte *staticOtherPublicKey, const byte *ephemeralOtherPublicKey,
00016                 bool validateStaticOtherPublicKey) const
00017 {
00018         return d1.Agree(agreedValue, staticSecretKey, staticOtherPublicKey, validateStaticOtherPublicKey)
00019                 && d2.Agree(agreedValue+d1.AgreedValueLength(), ephemeralSecretKey, ephemeralOtherPublicKey, true);
